credit_line: Gift of International Business Machines Corp.
title: Carrying cloth (servilleta)
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered plain weave
description: Carrying cloth (servilleta) of white cotton plain weave embroidered in bright red, yellow, and green in all-over pattern of dime-sized dots, some connected by lines to form stars, bands, or constellations, in a random design. One small striped bull, off center. Embroidery is in a long stitch radiating from a central point and is reversible. Small red tassels at corners.
name: Carrying cloth (servilleta)
